item.title: Draganfly Stock Takes Off On Fresh Defense Technology Alliance Focused On Asia-Pacific Region
item.description: Draganfly signed a collaborative framework with Babcock and Critical Infrastructure Technologies to jointly explore defense and security opportunities...

item.title: Netflix Stock Downgraded As Warner Bros. Acquisition Sparks Caution
item.description: Rosenblatt Securities downgraded Netflix to ‘Neutral’ from ‘Buy’, citing concerns about the uncertainty and risks following the acquisition.

item.title: Why Did Structure Therapeutics Stock Surge Pre-Market Today?
item.description: Shares of Structure Therapeutics shot up over 30% in premarket trading after the company announced positive topline data for its new weight loss pill.

item.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy Makes Its Largest Weekly Bitcoin Purchase Since July
item.description: Saylor revealed that he is in talks with sovereign wealth funds and hedge funds to expand adoption.

item.title: Paramount Skydance Comes Out With Hostile Bid For Warner Bros. Discovery, Offers $18B More In Cash Than Netflix’s Consideration
item.description: Paramount is offering $30 per share in cash, and the company stated that the proposed transaction is for the entirety of WBD, including the Global Net...
